website_summaries.verdict: A simple way to add better bass output in your car without having to drill or cut any holes in the interior.
pros: Under-seat design of the subwoofer places the speaker in the optimal position to feel the low end of most styles of music
Easier to install in the interior than other individual subwoofer speakers
cons: 600-watt maximum power rating doesn't provide the same dynamics and volume as some comparable speakers

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT, make some brackets to get it off the carpet !
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this installed for about a week and this thing rocks ! I did not install this to the deck. I did however make sure that it would have air flow under it by making a small platform to keep it from the carpet. I strongly suggest to anyone installing any amp to allow for plenty of air flow! they blow When an amp gets hot, If they get too hot you could get a fire, Mostly what happens is you will "RAT: the speakers. If you don't know what that is, go sit in an old car with original speakers and turn the radio all the way up !
customer_reviews.author: officermcbride

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I will say that this really passed my expectations! I will say though that the key to optimal performance is to place it under the drivers seat and hold on!!! It rattles the spare change in my center console when I have it on about mid volume! Turn it louder and the change turns into jumping beans! My stereo was a C- before I installed this and now I give it a solid A-! Highly recommend to anyone. I don't see a need to pay double or triple the price for big name brand after experiencing this budget beauty!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: Loveit, Loveit, Loveit!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the problem for years with a very expensive stereo when I crank up the base through the normal speakers sounding dampened. I finally pried the money out of my wallet for this and it made all the difference in the world. I like 70's metal, and I can listen to it the way I like without any distortion. If I had one critique, it would be to add instructions about the 8 gauge wire and the 20 amp fuse you need to install it, when you're ordering.
customer_reviews.author: William Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: IV had this now for several months in my jeep. I was tired of going on rides and not being able to hear anything through the loud wind on the outside of the jeep. I purchased some cheap upgraded speakers along with this product and it sounds pretty darn good for the price and size of this unit. I'm not much of a car electronic person so it did take me almost 8 hours to put this in but I'm also a perfectionist and had to have everything in the right place. Overall totally happy with this product but if you arent a tech guru I recommend you ensure you have a weekend to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: It works ok
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. For the money it’s a deal. But once I turn my volume up to about 75% can’t really tell it’s there.low volume is obvious, but again once you crank up your radio it somewhat looses its job. I have my wired up in my 2017 Gti s. I am using the speaker signal not rca. Not sure if that has something to do with it. I suggest using better hardwire to mount it, the screws it came with came out after two days.
customer_reviews.author: samul solis

customer_reviews.title: Blew after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: So I initially gave this a 4 star but now I reduced it to a 1 star. When initially installed on my hilux it worked great, got a nice little thump. But after 3 days of use, and by that I mean 2 hours of use per day, the speaker started to flap and then stopped playing completely. In all please don't buy this item, your better off installing some good mid speakers on the head unit to give you a full range of sound.
customer_reviews.author: Subash Sudama

customer_reviews.title: hard hitting wallet saving superhero
customer_reviews.text: this sub is for a very specific use. I have a 2012 nissan altima coupe a pretty small car. I have aftermarket stereo, and alpine speakers, and this little sub competes with my alpines! it doesnt have a super hard hitting quality but it definetly has enough bass to make you smile while listening to dubstep. BTW do not over tune this sub, if you incorrectly tune the LPF this sub will overheat and burn up components in the amp
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: After 5 months it's dead
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 5 solid months. until one day it just stopped. Checked it with a cable to the phone and it's dead. lights up as if it is working but no sound at all. Replaced with a slightly more expensive Kenwood under seat to fix it. Do not buy this if you expect it to stay working for more than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great for that little extra kick
customer_reviews.text: Definitely won’t win you a sound system contest. But it’s perfect in what I was looking for. I have a 2000 z3, there isn’t much space to put a decent sub. This just adds a perfect kick and it’s actually pretty powerful at decent listening levels. Put it this way, I can put the top down, and even with the sound of wind, I can hear my music clear as day.
customer_reviews.author: chrisben

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money underseat Sub
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the best value for money underseat sub. I have it installed in my SUV placed under the driver's seat. Fills the missing bottom end of the music just right. Makes the music sound so much better and fuller. It certainly is right soln for those who want fuller and complete music. If you want earth shattering bass, then look somewhere else cause this is not the right soln for that. Build quality is very good and extremely heavy, i was actually surprised. Controls to tune the sub are also pretty good. The remote volume control is useful though its not well calibrated. Acts as an on-off kind of control with limited level control.
customer_reviews.author: Taninder S.

customer_reviews.title: Fits in a 1998 Ford ranger XLT
customer_reviews.text: Was a breeze to install did not go to the hardware store once. I have installed many stereos over the years. It's been a long time it reminds me of high school. I have a JBL head unit and I use JBL door speakers all In under $300 perfect for a work truck. It sounds great takes a little time to tune it but worth the time. It's only been two weeks but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: ABJoanning

customer_reviews.title: Solid bottom end filler.
customer_reviews.text: Solid case build. Will not fit under front seat of 2001 F250 supercab. Installed under jump seat in back. Rounds out bottom frequency spectrum just fine, leaving my door speakers working on mids to highs. Still tweaking crossover frequency. This unit will not blow your windows out, but effective for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Lunavation

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound for the size
customer_reviews.text: Installed as an auxiliary subwoofer in a 2015 BRZ for some added bass. Not bad for an 8" sub in such a small enclosure. It's not heart pounding but if you're looking for a sub to complement an existing factory system, this did fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is fantastic. It's not going to shake your car but ...
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is fantastic. It's not going to shake your car but you will have some wonderful bass. I'm really into my music and I am not disappointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition
customer_reviews.text: I've had this in my camper van under the drivers seat for two years and it's great. I have a decent Kenwood head/speaker system that sounded just fine before...the addition of this sub is just amazing. I can crank any kind of music as loud as I need to. Full, immersive sound. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stepanski

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy Install
customer_reviews.text: As far as the installation goes, this amplified subwoofer is definitely a quicker and easier install that if you had to install an amp, put the sub in an enclosure, and hook everything all up. I was not looking for booming base. I just wanted to some bottom end to go along with the decent highs and mids I already had. Went in a classic two-seater than I often drive with the t-tops off. It also has a rumbling exhaust. It has dramatically improved the sound, especially when driving with the tops off.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ishmael

customer_reviews.title: If it worked longer than 2wks it would’ve been GREAT
customer_reviews.text: It worked for about 2 weeks and then no sound. Blue light comes on and all wires are properly connected and it just stopped. Shame too cause I really liked it but hey now I have the wires already run so I think I’ll go with a big brand name and spend the money so I have good sub for more than 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Lots of boom for a wee sub.
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I could fit in my geo tracker (under the passenger seat) without giving up the little bit of cargo space in the back. Didn't want anything too terribly powerful, especially since the car rattles enough on its own, but it's the only tracker around here with bass. Good deal for the price and perfect for very small vehicles. Plus, there's nothing worse than spending a ton of money on a system and totalling out your car just to watch the whole thing get towed away by your insurance company.
customer_reviews.author: nessa

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I just got a bad speaker. Other than that i liked it
customer_reviews.text: Never worked. Hook everything up lights turned on and nothing. Made sure everything was hooked up right and nothing. Made a little sound but couldn't notice any gain in bass over stock system. Maybe I just got a bad speaker. Other than that i liked it. Great looking and fit perfectly under my rear seat in my jeep.
customer_reviews.author: CSA52

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, nice compact design!
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact design. Poor instructions so be aware of that. But once you start messing with the settings, you quickly figure out how to get the base you want out of them. Once I had them dialed in they sounded great. if you like deeper base you might want the 10" however if space is limited like mine, these were perfect
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Dag Um Nice Unit
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I was gonna like this unit. Many people complain about the sound of these slim boxes. I found that this LO-PRO-8 performed above and beyond my expectations. Man. We sure have come a long way in the bass department. I mounted this unit under the passenger seat of my lil pickup truck. It sounds like something a lot bigger. The bass is rich and deep. It aint gonna rattle the neighbors, but it does rattle me inside the cab. Three people that heard it wanted me to install one in their vehicles. I'm very please with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Broc

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice sub/amp for $60
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I hooked it up under the passenger seat of a Xterra. It fits really good. The sound is good and adds extra bass. I listen to metal, and it sounds good. Hip pop or anything with extra bass sounds better.
customer_reviews.author: DTurnbo

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the sound quality. It installed beautifully in my 2017 Golf. I knew it wasn’t going to shake the car like a traditional large sub box and amp. But it sure did fill in the lows where my factory system was lacking. It looks like a quality product, but time will tell. I’m glad I took the chance on this one.
customer_reviews.author: jason w.

customer_reviews.title: Quite the boom for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely impressed with what this sub/amp combo does for a factory sound system. I went into this with fingers crossed that I would get an "okay" sound out of it, but was supprised. It does quite well in an extended cab Ford Ranger. Pair it with some aftermarket tweeters and your set! No where near the boom of the custom dual 10s I had in my single cab, but really kicks with my rock music! Gonna put this puppy to the test and will report back in the future.
customer_reviews.author: candice johnson

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Very good for whays its intended for surprisingly well made and heavy for price sounds decent its not Phoenix gold or mtx quality bit sounds good and comes with everything you need .
customer_reviews.author: Manny Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Love this little Woofer!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. This won't make your car sound like a dubstep club scene but will give you that optimal bass that you've been craving when you play your stock stereo. A much needed upgrade/add on to the stock set-up and the best part is it is very portable and all inclusive.
customer_reviews.author: Arcticwynd

customer_reviews.title: Eh ..
customer_reviews.text: I mean you get what you pay for. I've had this since February, Installed March/April time frame. It was decent while it worked but the sub just blew out on me the other day. I wouldnt buy it again but who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Elder

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This unit fit perfectly under the rear seat of my F-150 crew cab. Made a significant improvement to the sound quality. Very pleased. Be sure to get the installation kit if you are not replacing an existing sub/amp unit.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: An excellent single-box solution
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good subwoofer system for limited space. Small enough to fit under a seat, but in a small vehicle it would be close to rear seat passengers' feet. I installed it in the trunk of my Civic LX and was surprised to see how little space it occupied. All important parameters can be adjusted by easily accessible controls. Bass response is very good, undistorted and free of rattles at sound levels that would disturb others on the street. Easy installation with the materials and instructions provided.
customer_reviews.author: L. O'Meally

customer_reviews.title: For such a small and thin unit it puts out plenty of low end. Just be sure to fine-tune it correctly.
customer_reviews.text: For such a small and thin unit it puts out plenty of low end. The instructions on how to fine-tune the settings could be a bit clearer, and it wasn't obvious that it didn't include the cables or fuse, though it seems that's somewhat standard for subs. Once I got it installed (pretty painlessly) and mounted it works great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Koeppen

customer_reviews.title: AMazing
customer_reviews.text: This is great little unit for the price, fills out the sound very well. The unit itself is very solid
customer_reviews.author: chris ramsdell

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny..sounds fantastic for an 8" woofer....I bought one like this from another manufacturer and it overheated after a half hour...I drive three hours a day while listening to loud music an not one problem.....check the dimensions to see if it fits your needs it wouldn't fit under my front seat but I rigged it to fit under my back seat(extended cab Colorado)LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: K-1

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for its price.
customer_reviews.text: I after reading the many bad reviews of this product I was a little worried about buying it. This is an 8 inch enclosed sub. It produces good quality lowes. The "Thump" is ok with most songs across the many genres I listen to. Note if a song is filled with lows that varies in pitch at about the same time they may not be reproduced correctly (super bass by Niki M) But don't let that stop you from getting this sub. When setting this sub up try to use a wobble tone generator to tune your system (Google low frequency wobble tones) This sub will fit anywhere encuding under your front seats.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Dukes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go in my 2012 Toyota Highlander to give me richer sound than I was getting with the factory speakers. I placed it behind the second row of seats. It does not disappoint. I can dial in as little or as much bass as I want. I do wish some of the adjustments other than bass level were available on the wired remote control, but it's far from a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Somers

customer_reviews.title: It's low; it's pro.
customer_reviews.text: This was one of very few amplified subwoofers small enough to fit under a front seat of my 1989 Saab 900 convertible. And it was hard to find; it was back-ordered almost everywhere. So I bought a next-to-new model on Amazon. For all intents and purposes, the one I received was new. As pleasant as that was, the real pleasure was how it sounds. In a word, incredible. This thing booms, with no discernible distortion. Thank God it comes with a volume control. The installation was just three days ago, so I have no idea of how durable it will be. But it sounds great, and is completely invisible. At this point, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: William Martin

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Once you set everything fine, it sounds very good. Installed under the passenger seat in a mitsubishi L200 pickup, fits perfectly and adds a good bass sound. Installed 1 week ago and no problems at the moment. Dont expect a big boom, it is just to improve the sound inside the car.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the results! Not over bearing, added just the right amount of bass for a Quality sound!
customer_reviews.author: SMG'it1

customer_reviews.title: Good for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: Used the 8" sub-woofer on my Polaris General. Needed a little bass. It works for that. The bass is a little low on the 8". Wish I could fit the 10" but I had just enough room for the 8". We will see how everything does over time. The speaker is hidden, but is still in the open elements. the control knob is a nice touch as well. Altogether a nice unit but would get at least 10's for any vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Garon J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install, decent features and compact enough to hide away beneath the seat or in the corner of the trunk. It gets pretty loud but at higher volumes they lose their musicality and just get boomy without much expression. At lower volumes, set at the right crossover point, they're very punchy and compliment smaller door speakers very well. A larger driver with better quality wattage would obviously be better but for an all-in-one it's a really nice package.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ngay

customer_reviews.title: Read me Seymour
customer_reviews.text: Pay no attention to the clowns that post bad reviews. Pretty certain that when we all bought this product we were not expecting to break windows . 100$ for a sub and amp built Into a slim design.This product is a solid choice for simply enjoying a wider range of frequencies. I gave it four stars simply because this is still new and has not been time tested.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio C

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good bottom end for a compact unit.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good bottom end for a compact unit. I needed something to add a bit of kick to my ford Transit work van. This unit is not only compact but puts out a surprising about of low end for it's size. I am very happy with it and it exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Alan In ATL

customer_reviews.title: 3rd unit
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I have purchased. I have never encountered any problems with any of them.
customer_reviews.author: lrrp101et

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound with just the right amount of bass
customer_reviews.text: Just like most, I just wanted a little bass and nothing so over powering that will rattle my whole truck. I also wanted a slim amplified set up that would make it an easy install under a seat. This is a solid set up and easy to adjust. It adds just the right amount of bass for my taste and very pleased with the quality so far.
customer_reviews.author: ksaddler

customer_reviews.title: Dead in 60 minutes. Disappointing performance.
customer_reviews.text: The unit worked for around an hour. Before it died, the sound was a definite improvement over the OEM Subaru Subwoofer it replaced but nothing exceptional. It was a birthday gift from my wife.
customer_reviews.author: TimCO

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Good bass for such a small speaker. It sounds clear and sounds great. The sound controller doesn't really work that well but its alright. i love it in my truck because its loud but not ridiculously loud its just right. It does not fit under my seat in my 2006 toyota tacoma extra cab but its so small it doesn't bother me. It took me a while to wire it because you need to find the remote wire which was hard to find but easy to slice and connect once i found it.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny and much much more. I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny and much much more. I was shocked at the bass, I had to change the factory speakers. I put in in 2005 Land cruiser 100 series
customer_reviews.author: MJK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Other products had shipping issues or were 3 times the price of this one. So glad I went with the 8"Sound Storm. I had a car audio installer go over my wiring and he liked how it easily fit my vehicle and was impressed with the punch from the 8" speaker. No problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great for limited space
customer_reviews.text: LoPro 8 and 12 are a great solution to add bass in tight spaces.
customer_reviews.author: DoubleShot

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, this is a great economical way to add some bottom to your factory or aftermarket system. In my application this puts out plenty of deep bass. Pretty easy to install once you figure out how to get through the firewall. The included wired level control is pretty useless. Much better if you head unit can control subwoofer output.
customer_reviews.author: Phil M.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that everything is built in. Wired it up and it sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for the money.
customer_reviews.text: excellent under-seat sub. However it is a little bit long, it coud be an inch or 2 shorter to fit a bit better under the seat. I have no complaints about the sound, it transformed the audio in my dodge ram. I put this under the drivers seat.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Nui

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This item did not last past March. Do not order it. It lasted past the return frame. Which did me no good.
customer_reviews.author: Hottie

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value.
customer_reviews.text: As long as you are realistic in your expectations (of the limitations of this unit) it is a great addition to your car audio system.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Just enough bass to bring your stereo back to life
customer_reviews.text: Fits right under seat, even in a tiny Corolla, just the low end sound that's needed!
customer_reviews.author: El Emes

customer_reviews.title: but it sounds good at normal levels and fits under my seat fairly ...
customer_reviews.text: With the power rating don’t expect it to kick your teeth out, but it sounds good at normal levels and fits under my seat fairly well (01 Focus).
customer_reviews.author: MusicManiac998

customer_reviews.title: but once it's all straight it works nicely. Beware the extremely bright LED on the remote
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound in a relatively compact package. A bit of a pain to get all the wiring installed, but once it's all straight it works nicely. Beware the extremely bright LED on the remote, it really lights up the interior at night and could be a distraction if mounted in the wrong place. Mines in the center console behind my right elbow and it still lights up the mirror at night.
customer_reviews.author: Gary in SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Great subwoofer for the boat!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our new Pontoon boat. Mounted it inside the helm console. Easy hookup to existing stereo that already had subwoofer outputs. Sound quality is incredible for the price! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job nicely
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great in my 90 300zx it has plenty of performance to overcome a somewhat loud performance exhaust and road noise. I like my car stereo now. If you put a couple of these in a smaller car it may get a little punishing. When installing just make sure you use amp power wiring kit and mount the remote volume control in an easy to access location, it will get used.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: Good sub.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for small applications. Nothing booming but covers the low ends for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install easy to set up great price good sound. Seriously why wouldn't you? :-)
customer_reviews.author: glowspicey

customer_reviews.title: I guess the saying that you get what you pay ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess the saying that you get what you pay for is accurate when it comes to this item. 600 Watts? I don't think so. This thing is barely noticeable even when turned all the way up. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: nugentrocks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome I recommend to anyone wanting quality sound thats easy to place in tight spaces
customer_reviews.author: Jose Soto

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for low space applications
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not as loud as a larger sub, but offers much better bass than just a 6x9
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Not too loud and not too quite.
customer_reviews.text: I stuck this under my seat in my mazda 3 and it sounds awesome. I don't need everyone hearing my bass or my trunk rattling. This is just enough for me. And I'm not blaring it at full blast playing rap so I expect it to last longer then the negative reviews
customer_reviews.author: sarah phinney

customer_reviews.title: Great little subwoofer that fits underneath your car seat
customer_reviews.text: Great little subwoofer that fits underneath your car seat. Has enough kick to enhance your music, but don't expect it to be crazy enough to completely blow out your eardrums. Only concern that I've noticed is that it can get very hot sometimes. Otherwise a great buy for those lacking space for an actual sub or want something small.
customer_reviews.author: A.N.

customer_reviews.title: Having a few issues
customer_reviews.text: At first it was great, although I ment to get the 10 inch. Sound was good for about a month or so, then nothing. I checked all fuse and they are fine. So far no sound, no light. If someone could help me this issue it would be greatly appreciated. If not I'll just go with another sub
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year February now this speaker blew out the little blue light is on but no sound it was good while lasted don’t recommend it I will go with the name brand next time .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good punch in small package.
customer_reviews.text: Works and sounds good for being an under seat woofer. Would be nice to have better install instructions for novice installer.
customer_reviews.author: Joey McCurry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Great value for what it is. If you just want to add a little extra bass to you current car stereo system, this is great. I bought this because it’s small and I could easily fit it under a seat. Don’t expect it to win you any competitions though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound....recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, fit under the back seat of my 2006 Jeep, added much needed bass to an all mid/high system. I originally ordered the 10" version and wish that would have fix, but it was about 1 to 1.5 inches too wide to fit under the seat. this one fit perfect. as others state, its not going to thump the neighbors, but gives a good bottom end sound.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lodewyks

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: Adds bass but not real boom. Easy to install, sounds good. Great add to a standard stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what I needed... Little bump in the boat without breaking the bank!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Christie

customer_reviews.title: I am sad
customer_reviews.text: worked fine for a few weeks, recently pooped out on me.. replaced fuzes, Green light is on. No sound.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for golf carts
customer_reviews.text: Installed under the backseat of our golf cart. Sounds great and completely hidden
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It sound great...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, fit under the seat, great bass. love the remote control..
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine like it should.
customer_reviews.text: The sub does what it supposed to do. Like the other reviews, it's not going to thump but it will add the low end you need. The controller is a nice feature but its blinding blue led will kill you at night. All in all, it's a decent space saving sub. Edit: I've had it for a while now and after some tweaking, I have it sounding pretty good. Definitely fills out the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Justin R.

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Nobs rattle and turn itself down and when it was sent i had no bass control.
customer_reviews.author: rod m.

customer_reviews.title: Wow... I could not believe the quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow...I could not believe the quality sound coming from the unit...and it fit perfectly under the seat in my small pickup
customer_reviews.author: Frank Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: wasnt loud at all so I sent it back..not reccomended..
customer_reviews.author: Scott petty

customer_reviews.title: |Great deal.  Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Performs as expected. Installed it tonight in an f-150. Not a huge thumper, but definitely add that little bit of punch that the factory stereo was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brand

customer_reviews.title: Very good all in one product.
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and well designed product. Sounds great and hits hard and plenty of things to customize including the bass boost knob that comes with it
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Joseph Mahl

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the product and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it does what it says, decent sound quality for the size and a good bargain! It installs easily and provides good bass for smaller vehicle applications where space is tight.
customer_reviews.author: etsu karsten

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It was a pretty simple install. Definitely a noticeable improvement in my truck. The bass knob would be my only complaint. It works just not like I wish it did.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: perfect for 2 door pickup!
customer_reviews.text: easy to install. put this behind the seat's in my 2 door ford ranger, sounds amazing the perfect amount of bass. if you don't know electrical then have someone trained install it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Bunn

customer_reviews.title: LIKE OTHERS I AM SO PLEASED WITH THE BASS RESPONSE ...
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS TO ADD SOME BASS TO MY EXISTING CAR RADIO. I HAVE A SATURN SKY WITHOUT THE MONSOON SOUND SYSTEM.THERE IS VIRTUALLY NO ROOM TO INSTALL A LARGE SUBWOOFER AND AMP (I DIDNT WANT TO USE VERY VALUABLE SPACE IN THE TRUNK). LIKE OTHERS I AM SO PLEASED WITH THE BASS RESPONSE THIS ADDED TO MY CAR. ITS NOT OVERPOWERING , NOT HOLLOW SOUNDING. GREAT PRODUCT. I HAVE ANOTHER CAR THAT ILL BE INSTALLING ONE OF THESE.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN KELLEY

customer_reviews.title: Works well for size.
customer_reviews.text: Very compact perfect addition to my stereo for a full sound and lower frequency not too much .
customer_reviews.author: Opinionator

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This sub is perfect for my application. Single cab 90’s ranger tucked right behind the driver’s seat. It’s all the sound I’ll ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Rooney

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me, small compact and less expensive then other name brands. Pretty easy to install if you're not a D*mbsh*t. Overall, it fills in that low bass, so you don't have to crank your speakers to get that loud a** sound you like when a great tone comes on.
customer_reviews.author: Iseeyouwiththis

customer_reviews.title: The bass is great!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get it to fit under my seat but, I do have a good back rest and woofer in one 🤣. Superb base for a shallow mount.
customer_reviews.author: Juan J. Flores-Loza

customer_reviews.title: so this worked out great! Wiring was pretty easy and can hides nicely ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a little bit more bass and didn't have any room in my 2 seater for a full sub, so this worked out great! Wiring was pretty easy and can hides nicely behind the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Leung

customer_reviews.title: Good sound in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Its not going to go thump thump, but if you want to balance out your system its perfect
customer_reviews.author: Brian H

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, unreliable junk.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after about 3 weeks. Never played it past distortion, Looks nice and fit great, but over heated within a couple minutes with plenty of airflow.
customer_reviews.author: Martha K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of bass
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for adding an appropriate amount of bass. My 1998 wrangler sounded dull and empty, this fit perfect under the back seat and fills the sound well. Not too much and not too little. Easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good sound in my f150 extended cab
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good sound in my f150 extended cab. Make sure and get a good ground- sound was cutting in and out and the sub was going into protection mode until I grounded it properly. Has worked well for 6+ months.
customer_reviews.author: Kiley Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Ad description is wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I was misled.. the ad says 10 inch in description.. but i got a 8" not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Galt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product if you just simply want to add a ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product if you just simply want to add a little kick in your base. So happy with ot I purchased another one for my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Camper73

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! It's a tight fit under the seat of ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! It's a tight fit under the seat of my 64 pic up but it's cool. I haven't balanced everything but if it should only sound better. Nice final touch to the 6x9s and replacement speaker in the dash! Glad I made the purchase. It did arrive with a dinged up corner but it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: byron d thompson

customer_reviews.title: Smooth.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid. Requires some tuning, but can't beat the price and all in one package.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Rusinov

customer_reviews.title: VERY  LITTLE  BASS !!!!
customer_reviews.text: it has very little bass. I think it was a waste of money. not happy at all. if you want bass in your music, don't buy this product, you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This fit the bill, compact with enough bass to ...
customer_reviews.text: This fit the bill, compact with enough bass to fit behind the seat of my 2003 single cab Ford ranger. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: martinez guereca

product_meta.title: Sound Storm Laboratories LOPRO8 Amplified Car Subwoofer - 600 Watts Max Power, Low Profile, 8 Inch Subwoofer, Remote Subwoofer Control, Great For Vehicles That Need Bass But Have Limited Space, Black
product_meta.description: Size:8 Inch 600 WattsGive your vehicle's audio system an upgrade with the SSL LoPro8 Class A/B 8"" Low Profile Amplified Subwoofer. This powerful Amplified Subwoofer features 600 Watts Max Power with a MOSFET power supply to take your music to the next level. With High and Low Level Inputs it can be hooked up to just about any in-dash stereo. At a height of just 3"", it's perfect for fitting into tight spaces, including under the seat of many vehicles. Customize the sound with the Variable Low Pass Crossover, Bass Boost, Subsonic Filter, Phase Control and Remote Subwoofer Control. Gear up and get your music thumping with the Sound Storm LoPro8
feature_bullets: BUILT-IN AMPLIFIER: With a MOSFET power supply you get improved switching speeds, better performance with less power from the driver, lower gate-to-drain feedback capacitance, lower thermal impedance for higher switching frequencies

VARIABLE LOW-PASS FILTER: A low-pass filter is an electronic circuit that removes all the notes below the filter's frequency setting. You will use the Low-pass filter to primarily keep high notes out of your subwoofer(s)

HIGH LEVEL INPUTS: Speaker level inputs are commonly referred to as high-level inputs. It will be used to connect the LOPRO8 to your factory radio or an aftermarket radio that does not have low-level (RCA) inputs

LOW LEVEL INPUTS: Line level inputs, also known as RCA inputs or low-level inputs, use RCA interconnect cables to link the LOPRO8 with the source unit. Most aftermarket radios have multiple pairs of RCA outputs that can connect to multiple amplifiers
VARIABLE BASS BOOST: Variable Bass Boost allows you to adjust the low bass within the boost range to just the way you like it
DIMENSIONS: 15” x 9.75” x 3”. If you are short on space, this is a great solution for you. The combination of amplifier and subwoofer all into one, makes this ideal for spatially challenged vehicles

WARRANTY: Sound Storm provides a Powerful 3 Year Platinum Online Dealer Warranty so long as the purchase is made through Amazon.com. We strongly encourage professional installation of this product to ensure proper and safe functionality
